title: What is the difference between overtones and undertones? - Quora

response.answer_text: Your question is not complete. First of all you have tell us overtone and undertone refers to what? It may be applicable to painting also. Overtone and undertone of colour used in this picture is marvelous. In music to-overtone and undertone mean the pitching and tonal quality of the instrument while playing. Political overtone means an aesthetic theory with definite political overtones. UNDERTONE:a low or subdued tone: to speak in undertones. 2.	an unobtrusive or background sound: an undertone of static from the receiver. 3.	an underlying quality or element; undercurrent: There was an undertone of regret in his refusal. 4.	a subdued color; a color modified by an underlying color.

Overtone A subtle or subsidiary quality, implication, or connotation. "The decision may have political overtones" Synonyms: connotation, hidden meaning, secondary meaning, implication, association, undercurrent, undertone, echo, vibrations, hint, suggestion, insinuation, intimation, flavour, colouring, smack, suspicion, feeling, aura, atmosphere, nuance, trace, murmur, touch, vein; rare subcurrent Undertone is an attitude that lies under the ostensible tone of a literary work. In simple words, it is an implied meaning that usually points towards the underlying theme of a work.
